entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
CALM WINDS

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
